languages.text: "Ты недооцениваешь размеры и стойкость Темного города. Он пережил тысячи дизъюнкций и переживет еще тысячи новых, чтобы оставаться источником ваших ночных кошмаров".
"You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."
languages.original_text: "Ты недооцениваешь размеры и стойкость Темного города. Он пережил тысячи дизъюнкций и переживет еще тысячи новых, чтобы оставаться источником ваших ночных кошмаров".

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of Disjunctions and will survive thousands more to remain the fuel of your nightmares."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of Disjunctions and will survive thousands more to remain the fuel of your nightmares."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of Disjunctions and will survive thousands more, fuelling your nightmares."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of Disjunctions and will survive thousands more, fuelling your nightmares."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Subestimas el tamaño y fortaleza de la Ciudad Siniestra. Ha sobrevivido a miles de disyunciones y sobrevivirá mil más para seguir alimentando vuestras pesadillas».
languages.original_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: «Subestimas la magnitud de la Ciudad Siniestra y su resistencia. Ha sobrevivido a miles de disyunciones y sobrevivirá a miles más, alimentando vuestras pesadillas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous sous-estimez la taille et la résilience de la Cité Crépusculaire. Elle a survécu à des milliers de disjonctions et en verra bien d'autres. Vos cauchemars sont loin d'être finis. »
languages.original_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: « Vous sous-estimez la taille et la résilience de la Cité Crépusculaire. Elle a survécu à des milliers de disjonctions et en verra bien d'autres. Vos cauchemars sont loin d'être finis. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前は仄暗き都の規模と強靭さを侮ってる。これまで数千もの分裂に耐え抜いてきたし、これから数千回耐え抜いて、お前の悪夢に火を注ぐだろうよ」
languages.original_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は仄暗き都の規模と強靭さを侮ってる。これまで数千もの分裂に耐え抜いてきたし、これから数千回耐え抜いて、お前の悪夢に火を注ぐだろうよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr unterschätzt die Größe und Widerstandsfähigkeit der Dunklen Stadt. Sie hat schon tausende von Disjunktionen überlebt und wird noch tausende weitere überleben und als Futter für Eure Albträume weiterleben."
languages.original_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr unterschätzt die Größe und Widerstandsfähigkeit der Dunklen Stadt. Sie hat schon tausende von Disjunktionen überlebt und wird noch tausende weitere überleben, die Euren Albträumen Futter liefern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你低估了黑暗之城的规模，也低估了它的恢复能力。既然它经历过几千次分裂而屹立不倒，那它还会再经历几千次分裂，让你的噩梦生生不息。”
languages.original_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: “你低估了黑暗之城的规模，也低估了它的恢复能力。既然它经历过几千次分裂而屹立不倒，那它还会再经历几千次分裂，让你的噩梦生生不息。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kara Şehir'in boyutunu ve dayanıklılığını hafife alıyorsun. Yüzlerce ayrışımdan sağ çıktı ve kâbuslarını süslemek için yüzlercesine daha kafa tutacak."
languages.original_text: "You underestimate the Dark City's size and its resilience. It has survived thousands of dysjunctions and will survive thousands more to live on as fuel for your nightmares."
